author: Braelyn Wood
title: You Could Vacation In The 'Beauty And The Beast' Castle-Win a trip to the beauty and the beast castle
text:
You Can Now Vacation In A Fairy Tale Castle Just Like 'Beauty and The Beast' 
Because everyone wants to live like royalty. HomeAway By Braelyn Wood and Samantha Swantek Feb 14, 2017 IMPORTANT: You can now vacation like the queen you are. HomeAway, a vacation rental marketplace, is giving away an amazing, once in a lifetime trip to Dun Castle in Scotland in celebration of the release of Disney's live action Beauty and the Beast. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below The fourteenth century castle is located on 12,000 acres of land, is authentic AF, and even though the stay is worth almost $15,000, there is no fee to apply ! The full package includes roundtrip airfare, delicious meals and entertainment while you rule the castle for five days without any outside interruptions. Bow down, peasants. HomeAway And, while the palace won't be stocked with talking candelabras and teacups, it will have 20 of your closest friends. That's right â€” the winner gets to invite their squad, so drop the news now and less the ass-kissing commence. If you're ready for your tiara (you were born ready), make sure to get your application signed, sealed and delivered by March 31st. And of course, encourage your besties to apply too, so you can tag along if they win the grand prize. That's just logic. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
